result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher Roberson II was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes:
05-04-2017/ Judge Hanah Dugan
The Court grants the defendat's request for release privileges.  
Defendant may be released for the following:  work-personal care worker for mother.

miscConds.notes:
Submit a DNA sample,  and pay the DNA surcharge.
Pay all costs and surcharges, or if not paid convert to a civil judgment.
To be enrolled in school to obtain GED/HSED by January 2016.
If the defendant successfully completes probation and commits no new crimes, the Court will grant expungement.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Roberson II

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: reflects 05-04-2017 court order for release privileges
Per Order of the Presiding Judge, Misdemeanor Division, this motion/request is hereby assigned to Judge Hannah Dugan, Branch 31, for review. mag
Defendant's pro se request for work release privileges.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Christopher Roberson in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Christopher Roberson in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court addresses Justice Point Report.  No action taken at this time.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
Court ordered defendant to be monitored by Drug Testing
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Christopher Roberson in court with attorney J. Dennis Thornton.  Defendant Christopher Roberson in custody.  
Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
